title: Which modern gadgets make life simple? - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Technology has changed almost every way we perform our daily tasks. The past years has come out with new technology gadgets that simplify our lifestyle and we can have fun with them. Here are a few new technology gadgets which add value to our time. Joyoung J7 Robot Cooker Assemble the ingredients, add to the pot, close the lid, and select a cooking mode. Then sit back, relax, and wait several minutes or so while the robotic cooker does the cooking for you. The built-in paddle stirs your own fresh, healthy ingredients and keeps foods moving at just the right speed; the function shuts off automatically to prevent over-cooking. With the help of Robot Cooker, the average cooking time is around five mikes. And it takes just 30 minutes to fully prepare a table of dishes. Also, there is no need to worry about smoke or oily messes. It is really a handy tool. There is an APP which offers you countless recipes with your smartphone.  MI Robotic Vacuum Cleaner Want to keep your floors clean without lifting a finger? Let a robot do the work for you. Robot vacuums have completely revolutionized the way that people clean floors and it can clean your floors quickly and effectively. You no longer have to suffer the indignity of dragging around an unwieldy plastic hose connected to a clumsy, wheeled canister. In fact, you don't even need to get off of the couch. Set up the best robot vacuum cleaner for just one time. Then it will take care of the cleaning job and you will not have to worry about anything. MI Robotic Vacuum Cleaner, the highly intelligent home cleaning device, features a quality motor which delivers a high amount of suction, a good battery and a laser-based navigation.  Xiaomi Mijia Loock With the Xiaomi Mijia Loock, you can achieve four different types of unlocking methods: using the fingerprint reader, through your smartphone connected via Bluetooth, a numeric password or a physical key. For accurate and fast identification, Xiaomi Loock Smart Fingerprint Door Lock uses a semiconductor fingerprint module, which is considered to be more reliable than the optical one. Even experienced thieves cannot hack such a technology.  This lock is also equipped with a reminder function. If it detects fingerprint error or password incorrect entry the function will be activated. Your smartphone will receive a notification that the unlocking was unsuccessful. You can also open and close the door while away. It is convenient when there are children or elderly people in the house. MiniJ Automatic Soap Foam Dispenser Without actually having to touch the soap bar or pump, the automatic soap dispenser allows everyone to get some soap. All you do is slide your hand underneath, receive some soap and then wash your hands. Near-field infrared sensing method in MiniJ is more hygienic, more efficient, non-contact hand-washing liquid. It also improves the dispenser’s longevity and working hours, compared to other dispensers. Besides, the no-touch and easy-to-use operation that will only be activated when needed, will result in less mess. To conclude, it is convenient and quick, and is suitable for many home use scenarios.  Pinlo Master Mini Juicer Blender Between work and family, most of us don't have time to slice a bunch of vegetables and other ingredients by hand for a cup of juice every day. Before you throw up your hands and order take-out again, consider a Juicer&Blender to help you chop, slice, grind, and purée a wide variety of foods. Pinlo Master mini wall-breaking juicer has many functions that you can break ice in 5 minute, and vegetables juice or baby food. With 6 spiral blades, its maximum rotation speed is up to 1800 m/min, the juice can be produced in one second with a delicate mouth-feel, the ice can be made into crushed ice in 5 seconds.  MI Ninebot The simplified riding experience of MI Ninebot is powered by a combination of advanced control algorithms, precision sensors, and high-performance processors. it can move at up to 16km/h (10 mph), tackle 15 degree hills and run up to 22 km on a single charge. It's portable at 12.8 kilograms (28 pounds) and "fits easily in the trunk of your car. All in all, this personal mobility product allows you to travel conveniently, quickly, greenly and most importantly – fashionably.  Garmin Forerunner 645 Music packs advanced workout-tracking features in a stylish, round, stainless steel watch frame and offers on-board song storage, which is a first for Garmin. Aside from that, the 645 Music is simple to use, and its decent battery life is quite impressive given its small size.  Mi AI Mini Speaker The Xiaomi Mi AI Mini Speaker is the key to the smart home control, as it enables voice control for Mijia’s loT equipment such as air conditioners and TVs. In other words, you can use Mi AI to control most of the gadgets in your house by the sound of your voice. Moreover, everyone is AI trainer, you can teach the speaker and it will become smarter. So the next time when you ask something taught earlier, it will know how to reply.  PETKIT Smart Pet House Climate-Controlled Pet House is a marriage of technology and a love for pets. It operates fully autonomously and guarantees that your feline friends will remain warm even in the most extreme winter climates and refreshed in the most devastatingly arid or humid of summers.  Encircling structure will give your pet a cuddling experience and helps calm the nerve of your little loved ones. The ergonomically structured pet house will provide the lateral support important for cats of all ages and your cat will be the envy of cats everywhere. Also, smart energy control means leaving Petkit on at all times consumes only about 1KWH if you leave it all day on. Moreover, designed with a remote control button, the Pet House can be controlled remotely to switch between cooling and heating via APP. Starting from an ear cleaner to devices that are used in laproscopy, everything can be considered as a modern gadget that has made life much easier and interesting.  An ear cleaner gives you utmost satisfaction when your nails don't reach inside your ears, while the laproscopy surgery gadgets prevent a full fledged evasive operation we often had to undergo for removing painful cysts, appendix and stones in the stomach.
